function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Ineffective social isolation policies leading to a higher number of infections and deaths","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"False dichotomy between healthcare and the economy","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of customization of social intervention scenarios for specific regions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on the social and economical aspects of pandemics in governmental policymaking","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on a single model abm for simulating epidemiological and economical effects","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited generalizability of results to wider contexts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High number of deaths in certain scenarios","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic damage to businesses in certain scenarios","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in underdeveloped countries in implementing lockdowns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mandatory usage of face masks and physical distancing without mobility restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of face masks and 50% social isolation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption of partial isolation measures il < 0.5","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective epidemiological control with il = 0.5","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic impact of isolation on wealth loss for a3 agents","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conditional lockdown based on infection curve threshold","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effectiveness of vertical isolation policy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High risk of viral spreading within households due to close contact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic impact on industry due to inability of a1 agents to generate wealth","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mental health and well-being of individuals due to prolonged social isolation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to take action to avoid the increase of infected individuals by the sars-cov-2 virus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Flattening the infection curve","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transferability of the model to other societies","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hard-coded social constructs and periodic routines may not accurately represent real-world behavior, leading to unrealistic simulation outcomes.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Availability of source code and package may lead to unauthorized modifications or misuse of the simulation model.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Frequent ’business contact’ between a1 and a3 agents increases the risk of disease transmission in the population.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Monthly ’accounting’ actions involve economic transactions and payment of taxes, increasing the potential for disease transmission during in-person interactions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complexity of the model and economic interactions can lead to improper consideration of disease transmission and risk management.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High mobility of people increasing the probability of approaching infected individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited medical infrastructure for hospitalization cases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic impact of mobility restrictions on wealth exchange and economic dynamics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Highly contagious covid-19 disease","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of contagion between a1 agents","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic interactions between a1 and a3 agents","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mobility patterns of a1 agents","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential contact between agents leading to disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate parameter estimation for epidemic modeling","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Empirical estimation of population size parameter affecting simulation execution time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of face masks and social isolation measures may not be effective in containing the spread of the covid-19 virus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transfer of the agent-based model to other contexts without corresponding data may lead to inaccurate predictions and recommendations.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration of socioeconomic and cultural factors in the agent-based model may lead to ineffective policy recommendations for disease control and mitigation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possible covid-19 spreading due to lack of social isolation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective control of the disease with low isolation rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to implement recommended control strategies , universal mask use and social distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Focus on the mathematical modeling for epidemics and recent papers related to sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of equation-based models to simulate the epidemic dynamics","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of the seir model with a known incubation period","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Simulating covid-19 epidemic with seir agent-based model","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assessment of economic effects of different social-distancing scenarios","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on government enforcement of social isolation measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simulating the effects of social-distancing interventions and other control measures may lead to inaccurate or flawed predictions of
